reviews.review_msg: She is nice. Helpful if you need it, but really you probably won't need much help. The work is pretty easy. The tests are graded easy too. The only annoying this is the group projects, especially if you get a bad group. Groups are assigned so you have no choice in that matter anyway. Just memorize her lecture notes for exams.

Really frustrating prof. His lectures are so boring and pointless. He rambles on and on and gives only a five minute break. He gives no criteria for major projects leaving you high and dry. Quizzes are pretty straightforward but avoid this prof if you can!
